glsa.title: JBIG-KIT: Denial of service
glsa.synopsis: A stack-based buffer overflow in JBIG-KIT might allow remote attackers to cause a Denial of Service.

background.p: JBIG-KIT is a software implementation of the JBIG1 data compression standard.

description.p: JBIG-KIT contains a stack-based buffer overflow in the jbg_dec_in function in libjbig/jbig.c.

impact.p: A remote attacker could possibly cause a Denial of Service condition via a specially crafted image file.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
